# Plugins are only supported on linux,cgo (!riscv64) (!mips64le) and darwin,cgo.
[!linux] [!darwin] skip
[linux] [riscv64] skip
[linux] [mips64le] skip
[!cgo] skip

go build -n testdep
! go build -buildmode=plugin testdep
stderr '-buildmode=plugin requires exactly one main package'

-- go.mod --
module testdep

go 1.16
-- testdep.go --
package p
